availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Priscilla Nourse Wilson. Father of Annie J. Wilson. County Attorney in 1862.

ab.bibl:
“Death of Mr. Joseph G. Wilson,” Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), June 24, 1879, p. 4.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 466
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 152B
Find A Grave, "Joseph G. Wilson (1833-1879)," Memorial #109923533, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/109923533 (accessed June 13, 2017).
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7007126, Jefferson County Deaths, p. 880
